attributes.action: hold a public and independent inquiry into the revelations by Neather concerning the deliberate attempt by Labour to change the face of the nation through mass immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition requests that the Prime Minister establishes an independent commission to investigate the claims by Neather to the effect that the Labour government pursued a deliberate policy to transform Britain through mass immigration and refused to make their motivations clear to the electorate
